FILE(GLOB_RECURSE app_sources ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.*)

idf_component_register(
    SRCS "main.c"
    INCLUDE_DIRS "."
    REQUIRES 
        nvs_flash
        esp_wifi
        esp_http_server
        mqtt
        esp_adc

        json
)
